sentences.en: But that optimism assumes analysts aren't being irrationally exuberant about the pace of profit recovery.
sentences.cn: 但这种乐观情绪的前提是,分析师对公司收益复苏的步伐的预期是理性的.

sentences.en: Irrationally held truths may be more harmful than reasoned errors ( Thomas H. Huxley ).
sentences.cn: 无理性地推崇真理往往比合理的错误更有害. ( 托马斯H赫胥黎 ).

sentences.en: Some feel lonely and depressed, while others may become irrationally anxious or guilty.
sentences.cn: 有些妇女感到寂寞和沮丧, 而有些妇女可能会变得情绪化或有罪恶感.

sentences.en: Superstition may cause people to behave irrationally.
sentences.cn: 迷信可能会让人丧失理智.
市场的走势是不是有点失去了理性?

sentences.en: They reacted irrationally to the challenge of Russian power.
sentences.cn: 他们对俄军的挑衅做出了很不理智的反应.

sentences.en: When stress rules one's life, one often acts irrationally, taking on the qualities an irritable individual.
sentences.cn: 当重压主宰了人的生活, 人总不免作出不合理的行为, 染上急躁的毛病.

words.tran_cn: 不合理的；无理性的；荒谬的
